summary: This is simply  dictionary of Xdebug2 functions
name: Xdebugxs-dictionary-of-functions
description:
This is simply  dictionary of Xdebug2 functions. So after install it you can use auto completion of these functions in your PHP scripts.

For more details watch http://xdebug.org/
install_details:
Copy the file to your \"dic directory\" (usually it is ~/.vim/dic) and add to your ~/.vimrc or PHP&#039s ftplugin config:

set dictionary+=~/.vim/dic/xdebug2
